text: Ezɨ gumazir dapaniba men mav kamaghɨn na mɨgei, “Nɨ arangan markɨ. Nɨ orakigh. Laionɨn kam Judan adarazir atrivimɨn oto, atrivir bar ekiam, an Atrivim Devitɨn ovavim, egha a mɨdorozim gamua uan apanim abɨragha gɨfa. Kamagh amizɨ a 7 plan kandelɨn grisɨn akɨnafarim mɨghɨrɨziba adegh, egh akɨnafarir kam onegham.”
